name: ChristChurchTempleSermons
0:
”Alexa, open christ temple sermons”
”Alexa, ask christ temple sermons for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start christ temple sermons”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christ temple sermons
des: Listen to the sermon podcast from Christ Episcopal Church in Temple Texas. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
